tag.narrative: 17.9 - Enhance international support for implementing effective and targeted capacity-building in developing countries to support national plans to implement all the Sustainable Development Goals, including through North-South, South-South and triangular cooperation.

17.9 - Öka det internationella stödet för genomförande av effektiv och riktad kapacitetsuppbyggnad i utvecklingsländerna till stöd för nationella planer för att genomföra alla målen för hållbar utveckling, inklusive genom samarbete nord–syd och syd–syd samt trepartssamarbete.

description.narrative: As per the contract agreement, NIRAS Sweden AB had timely submitted the following four results as deliverables: 1. Inception Report: The inception report for the final evaluation of Dairy Hub & Dairy Academy Development in Bangladesh Project which contained key findings from literature review, outlined of assessment of the scope, proposed approach and methodology, framework of the evaluation and final evaluation workplan after consultation with the Embassy of Sweden. As the purpose of the inception report was to ensure that all stakeholders are in agreement with the interpretation and operationalisation of the evaluation, which was done in successfully and Niras has meet the deadline by submitting the report by May 2018. 2. An Aid Memoir: The consultants had submitted an Aid Memoir with a presentation to Sida, PRAN and UNIDO where main findings of the evaluation were shared by July 2018 and the consultants had received important feedback to improve the evaluation findings more concrete manner First 3. Draft of the Evaluation Report: Embassy received the first draft report from NIRAS Sweden Ab by August 2018 after two weeks of the aid memoir presentation with key stakeholders. The report provided initial findings and key observations with lessons learnt and future direction of the Dairy Hub & Dairy Academy Development in Bangladesh Project. 4. Final Evaluation Report: Upon incorporation of comments received from key stakeholders Sida, PRAN and UNIDO, the evaluation report was finalized by Niras Sweden AB by September 2018 which was duly submitted to Sida for approval. So in summary, the Phase end evaluation of the Dairy Hub and Dairy Academy Project in Bangladesh contract has achieved it’s targeted output results successfully
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
